name: Pyro's Fever Dream
description:
Designed by: Ramsker https://www.youtube.com/ramsker

Programmed by: Exhaston https://exhaston.itch.io/

A short game made within a month as a Christmas gift for my friend Pyrocynical.

You can;

Jump

Collect Cigarettes 

Walk forward

Lick Batteries 

Fix your Deepest and Darkest Fantasies

Give Ramsker a Pay rise

IT'S ALL IN LE HEAD

As you talk to the Local's of the era stuck in PS1, they will ask you to get some items for them. They're not that interesting, but ifykyk I suppose lmao.

enjoy. 

Yes I am Pyrocynical's editor. Yes I am clinically insane.
